item.description:
Register Today - http://ow.ly/ducWQ
During this meetup our experts are going to discuss and, in some cases, demonstrate the top 10 aspects of user experience that need to be addressed by companies looking to provide the best user experience possible for visitors to their sites. They will also recommend best practices as well as introduce the latest trends that every business or organization should be aware of when it comes to user experience and visitors to their site. Register Today - http://ow.ly/ducWQ
item.name: Online Meetup - User Experience & Your Company Website
